definition: not divided among or brought to bear on more than one object or objective, a news report that is reported first by one news organization
details:
adjective
- not divided among or brought to bear on more than one object or objective
= synonyms: undivided
- excluding much or all
- not divided or shared with others
= example: not divided or shared with others
= synonyms: sole
noun
- a news report that is reported first by one news organization
= synonyms: scoop
